interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber Review Date: 2020/11/08 Store: P.travel Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'P.travel', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '11.2 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '740646020214', 'Manufacturer': 'P.travel'} Review Text: Overall, I would say that out of this small hair cutting package only the scissors, thinning shears, and hair clips are decent quality. The scissors are made out of stainless steel but when using them you will notice that they wont cut as smoothly compared to more expensive higher quality scissors. The shears worked perfectly fine for me and they did the job well.

Everything else provided in the package is more like the 3 star hotel freebies that are cheap and poorly made. The cape is only good for a few times before it will most likely rip apart and the combs provided were bend on arrival. Review Title: Decent scissors and hair clips Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LANDWIND Face Roller Massager, Y-Shape 3D Roller for Anti Aging, Face Lift, Anti Wrinkles, Skin Tightening (BA311) LANDWIND {'Product Dimensions': '5.8 x 1.8 x 1.6 inches; 12.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '791280480612'} Overall, the item feels premium and has a nice weight to it. The materials used are pretty nice and make it have a great feel when you touch it. The kneading balls are well lubricated at the base making them rotate with ease and never clunks around.

Unfortunately, the unit I received does not have a functioning micro current. I put it under the sun for over a day and I couldn't feel a thing. The place where the solar chargers are almost look like just a dark plastic shell with nothing behind it. Either I received a defective unit or this product has a misleading aspect to it. In addition, it says the product comes with a velvet cloth which is something I never received inside my packaging.

It's really an average product for its price point but I had to knock another star because off missing items and a nonfunctioning microcurrent. Average face roller with nonfunctioning microcurrent. allez outdoor | Biodegradable Cleansing Cloths | Natural Plant-Based Face and Body Wipes | PH Balanced | Cactus Bloom and Chaparral Scent | 20ct Individually Wrapped Towelettes Allez {'Brand': 'Allez', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 5.4 x 4.2 inches; 13.62 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ABWPS001', 'UPC': '860000823210', 'Manufacturer': 'Allez Outdoor, LLC'} Going on those long hiking trips you always dread the smell you carry on the way back and wish there was a convenient way to clean yourself up. With the Allez outdoor cleansing cloths I would say that your problems are solved!

The individually packed cloths fold out to a large size and retains moisture while being used heavily. I've used one wipe to clean my face, arms, legs, and back and there's still a good portion of moisture left on the wipe. In addition, with a nice scent to the wipe you feel really refreshed and clean after using them which is an amazing plus. I would say the best thing about these cloths compared to others is that they are well made and don't break apart after using them vigorously.

Overall, going hiking and staying outdoors this item should become an essential item in your pack! Great cleansing cloth that is biodegradable! 2oz / 60ml Glass Spray Bottles for DIY Refill, Essential Oils, Pillow Mists,Fine Mist Spray -3Packs Amber Color EagleKing {'Brand': 'EagleKing', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 6.1 x 1.7 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} For 5.99 these are some amazing quality spray bottles. I've been putting in hand sanitizer and essential oils in them and they're the perfect size. Good thick glass and a decent spray attachment makes the build quality on these pretty great.

if you're putting in liquids that can be damaged from UV light I would definitely suggest going for the amber clear color. Great portable glass spray bottles! Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings Cherry {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'} like this amber color, I used one bottle mixed with lemon essential oil to use in kitchen and family room, and another bottle mixed with lavender to use in laundry room. very neat and stylish to use. stylish, amber color Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK,Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist Settings Cherry {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.5 x 3.4 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523234156'} Upon receiving the product I was really satisfied with the glass bottle used as it felt and looked high quality. I've been using this with a cleaning solution to clean my kitchen countertops and it worked perfectly misting just enough to clean a large area.

My one gripe with this product is that the glass is so high quality but the spray nozzle is made of not so great quality plastic that feels rather flimsy.

Other than the quality issue with the nozzle, everything works well and it does the job! Wish the nozzle was higher quality. HEMP BODY BUTTER FOR DRY SKIN - All Natural Healing Moisturizer, Eczema, Psoriasis, Anti-Aging Elasticity/Hydration Formula, Vegan, Cruelty Free Skin Care, 8oz. (Butt Naked-Tropical Scent)-Piper Cove Piper Cove {'Brand': 'Piper Cove', 'Item Form': 'Butter', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.9 x 1.97 inches; 7.65 Ounces'} The hemp body butter comes in a high quality case and is incredibly soft. I've been using this for around a month and I still have about half left and it seems like it is a great moisturizer as it soothes my dry skin. Not only does it hydrates but it also has an amazing smell that is absolutely addicting.

The only gripe that I have with the product is that it's rather thick and it will leave a sticky residue on your skin for quite a while. Amazing smell and moisturizes Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber P.travel {'Brand': 'P.travel', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '11.2 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '740646020214', 'Manufacturer': 'P.travel'} Overall, I would say that out of this small hair cutting package only the scissors, thinning shears, and hair clips are decent quality. The scissors are made out of stainless steel but when using them you will notice that they wont cut as smoothly compared to more expensive higher quality scissors. The shears worked perfectly fine for me and they did the job well.

Everything else provided in the package is more like the 3 star hotel freebies that are cheap and poorly made. The cape is only good for a few times before it will most likely rip apart and the combs provided were bend on arrival. Decent scissors and hair clips
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user continues to focus on skincare tools aimed at anti-aging and skin tightening, while now also exploring professional grooming tools, specifically for hair cutting. Their interest in natural moisturizers and versatile storage solutions for essential oils, cleaning products, and aromatherapy persists.

- **Quality Expectations:** They maintain a strong emphasis on premium materials, preferring high-quality formulations across all product categories. Recent interactions show a consistent expectation for well-crafted tools, reflecting their appreciation for durability and effectiveness.

- **Functionality:** High performance remains crucial. The user seeks products that deliver specific results, whether in skincare or grooming, and emphasizes a satisfactory user experience with each item.

- **Packaging & Completeness:** The user values products that arrive in excellent condition, stressing the importance of both product integrity and quality packaging, as highlighted by their recent review of hair grooming tools.

- **Critical Reviewer:** They are an honest reviewer who prioritizes functionality and performance over aesthetics, providing balanced feedback that acknowledges both strengths and weaknesses, such as product efficiency and material quality.

- **Rating Tendencies:** Reflecting an analytical approach, the user gives balanced ratings and considers both effective features and areas needing improvement, as demonstrated in their recent ratings.

- **Diverse Use Cases:** Enthusiasm continues for practical products supporting daily self-care and grooming routines, emphasizing the need for usability, quality, and functionality across all purchased items. 

Overall, the user seeks high-quality solutions that combine effective performance with a reliable user experience.
